FALLBACK.MESSAGE_TITLE: Sorry, something went wrong with this application
FALLBACK.MESSAGE_FEEDBACK: Our team has been notified. If you would like to help, please, tell us what happened below.

NBACK.WELCOME_MESSAGE: Thank you for participating in this study. You will be performing an n-back working memory task.
NBACK.TASK_DESCRIPTION_1: In this task, you will see numbers displayed one at a time. Your job is to decide if the current number matches the number that appeared 1 position back in the sequence.
NBACK.TASK_DESCRIPTION_2: In this task, you will see numbers displayed one at a time. Your job is to decide if the current number matches the number that appeared 2 positions back in the sequence.
NBACK.TASK_DESCRIPTION_3: In this task, you will see numbers displayed one at a time. Your job is to decide if the current number matches the number that appeared 3 positions back in the sequence.
NBACK.TASK_DESCRIPTION_4: In this task, you will see numbers displayed one at a time. Your job is to decide if the current number matches the number that appeared 4 positions back in the sequence.
NBACK.INSTRUCTIONS_OVERVIEW: In this task, you will see a sequence of single-digit numbers (0-9) appearing one at a time on the screen. Each number will be displayed for a short time, followed by a brief pause before the next number appears.
NBACK.INSTRUCTIONS_SEQUENCE: The task is to monitor the sequence and respond when you notice a pattern.
NBACK.TASK_RULES_1: When you see a number that matches the number from 1 position back, press the spacebar (or click the mouse) as quickly as possible.
NBACK.TASK_RULES_2: When you see a number that matches the number from 2 positions back, press the spacebar (or click the mouse) as quickly as possible.
NBACK.TASK_RULES_3: When you see a number that matches the number from 3 positions back, press the spacebar (or click the mouse) as quickly as possible.
NBACK.TASK_RULES_4: When you see a number that matches the number from 4 positions back, press the spacebar (or click the mouse) as quickly as possible.
NBACK.EXAMPLES_1: Example: If you see the sequence 3 - 7 - 3, you should respond when you see the second 3 because it matches the 3 from 1 position back.
NBACK.EXAMPLES_2: Example: If you see the sequence 5 - 2 - 8 - 5, you should respond when you see the second 5 because it matches the 5 from 2 positions back. A sequence like 8 - 3 - 8 is only a 1-back match, so for 2-back you would NOT respond.
NBACK.EXAMPLES_3: Example: If you see the sequence 1 - 4 - 7 - 2 - 1, you should respond when you see the second 1 because it matches the 1 from 3 positions back.
NBACK.EXAMPLES_4: Example: If you see the sequence 6 - 3 - 9 - 4 - 6, you should respond when you see the second 6 because it matches the 6 from 4 positions back.
NBACK.RESPONSE_WHEN_MATCH: When you see a number that matches the target number from n positions back, respond immediately by pressing the spacebar or clicking the mouse.
NBACK.RESPONSE_WHEN_NO_MATCH: When you see a number that does NOT match, do nothing. Simply wait for the next number to appear.
NBACK.SPEED_ACCURACY_BALANCE: Try to be both fast and accurate. Both speed and accuracy are important for this task.
NBACK.PRACTICE_INTRO_MESSAGE: Before the main task, you will complete a short practice session. This will help you get familiar with the task.

PRACTICE.FEEDBACK_TEXT: Thank you for completing the practice session. Here are your results:
PRACTICE.PRESS_TO_CONTINUE: Press spacebar to continue to the main task

MAIN_TASK.READY_MESSAGE: You have completed the practice session. You will now begin the main task. Remember to respond when you see a matching number!
MAIN_TASK.PRESS_TO_BEGIN: Press spacebar to begin the main task
MAIN_TASK.COMPLETE_MESSAGE: Congratulations! You have completed the n-back task.

BREAK.TITLE: Take a Break
BREAK.MESSAGE: You have completed a portion of the task. Feel free to take a short break.
BREAK.PRESS_TO_CONTINUE: Or press spacebar to continue immediately

SETTINGS.DISPLAY_DURATION_HELP: How long each number is shown (100-2000 ms)
SETTINGS.CUSTOM_PRACTICE_SEQUENCE_HELP: Leave empty for random sequence. Enter comma-separated digits (0-9): 3,5,2,5,7,8,5,...
SETTINGS.CUSTOM_SEQUENCE_HELP: Leave empty for random sequence. Enter comma-separated digits (0-9): 3,5,2,5,7,8,5,...
